attributes.action: Introduce a compulsory school subject teaching social etiquette, tolerance and respect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to poor parenting as well at other factors, a growing number of people in our society are careless about keeping social harmony.  Decent polite people suffer at the hands of those who disregard others people, whether it be playing lou music in residential areas at unsocial times or spitting for no reason, swearing in front of young children etc.  Although these things seem like common sense and shouldn't need to be part of our education system, if at the end of the day these people are not being guided properly at home then for our benefit they should be taught in school - for all our sakes!
